summary: The conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a customer service representative (speaker_1) from Lendin Club, a peer-to-peer lending platform. The representative is making a welcome call to the customer who has recently started investing on the platform.
questions_asked: - From where did you get to know about our platform, sir, Lendin Club?
overall_sentiment:
Neutral.
The conversation is a routine welcome call from the platform to the new customer, with no major issues or concerns raised.
